Bit Manipulation Trick

Feb 14, 2017

  • Check if a number is even or odd. n&1 //0 means even, 1 means odd
  • Remove the last 1 digit. n&(n-1)
  • Swap two integers.
a ^= b;	//a = A^B;
b ^= a; //b = B^A^B = A
a ^= b;	//a = A^B^B^A^B = B

Recording bit manipulation shit.
